00034 // The maximum number of shortcuts associated with each wxCmd.
00035 #define wxCMD_MAX_SHORTCUTS                     3
00036 
00037 #ifndef wxID_INVALID
00038 
00039       // A value used to represent an invalid id...
00040       #define wxID_INVALID                      -1

00060 class wxKeyBind
00061 {
00062 protected:
00063 
00065       int m_nFlags;
00066 
00068       int m_nKeyCode;
00069 
00070 public:
00071 
00072       wxKeyBind() {
00073             m_nKeyCode = m_nFlags = -1;
00074       }
00075 
00076       wxKeyBind(int flags, int keycode) {
00077             Set(flags, keycode);
00078       }
00079 
00080       wxKeyBind(const wxString &key) {
00081             m_nFlags = StringToKeyModifier(key);
00082             m_nKeyCode = StringToKeyCode(key.AfterLast('+').AfterLast('-'));
00083       }
00084 
00085       virtual void DeepCopy(const wxKeyBind *p) {
00086             m_nFlags = p->m_nFlags;
00087             m_nKeyCode = p->m_nKeyCode;
00088       }
00089 
00090       virtual ~wxKeyBind() {}
00091 
00092 
00093 
00094 public:
00095 
00097       void Set(int flags, int keycode) {
00098             m_nFlags = flags;
00099             m_nKeyCode = keycode;
00100       }
00101 
00106       void Set(const wxKeyBind &key) {
00107             m_nFlags = key.m_nFlags;
00108             m_nKeyCode = key.m_nKeyCode;
00109       }
00110 
00112       bool MatchKey(const wxKeyEvent &key) const;
00113 
00115       bool Match(const wxKeyBind &key) const {
00116             if (m_nFlags == key.m_nFlags && m_nKeyCode == key.m_nKeyCode)
00117                   return TRUE;
00118             return FALSE;
00119       }
00120 
00121 
00122 
00123       // Getters
00124       // ------------------
00125 
00126       int GetKeyCode() const {
00127             return m_nKeyCode;
00128       }
00129 
00130       int GetModifiers() const {
00131             return m_nFlags;
00132       }
00133 
00134       // Returns the string which describes this key combination.
00135       wxString GetStr() const {
00136             return KeyModifierToString(m_nFlags) + 
00137                   KeyCodeToString(m_nKeyCode);
00138       }
00139 
00140 
00141 public:           // static utilities
00142 
00143       static wxString NumpadKeyCodeToString(int keyCode);
00144       static wxString KeyCodeToString(int keyCode);
00145       static wxString KeyModifierToString(int keyModifier);
00146 
00147       static int StringToKeyCode(const wxString &keyName);
00148       static int StringToKeyModifier(const wxString &keyModifier);
00149 
00150       static int GetKeyModifier(wxKeyEvent &event);
00151       static wxString GetKeyStrokeString(wxKeyEvent &event);
00152 };

00168 class wxCmd
00169 {
00170       // wxKeyBinder must be allowed to call #Exec()
00171       friend class wxKeyBinder;
00172 
00173 protected:
00174 
00176       wxKeyBind m_keyShortcut[wxCMD_MAX_SHORTCUTS];
00177       int m_nShortcuts;       
00178 
00180       wxString m_strName;
00181 
00183       wxString m_strDescription;
00184 
00186       int m_nId;
00187 
00188 protected:        // static
00189 
00192       typedef wxCmd *(*wxCmdCreationFnc)(int id);
00193 
00195       typedef struct {
00196             int type;
00197             wxCmdCreationFnc cmdCreateFnc;
00198       } wxCmdType;
00199 
00201       static wxCmdType m_arrCmdType[wxCMD_MAX_TYPES];
00202 
00204       static int m_nCmdTypes;
00205 
00206 
00207 public:           // static
00208 
00211       static wxCmd *CreateNew(int type, int id);
00212 
00214       static void AddCmdType(int type, wxCmdCreationFnc fnc);
00215 
00218       static wxCmdType *FindCmdType(int type);
00219 
00220 public:
00221 
00222       wxCmd(const wxKeyBind &first, int id, 
00223             const wxString &name = wxEmptyString,
00224             const wxString &desc = wxEmptyString) {
00225             m_strName = name;
00226             m_strDescription = desc;
00227             m_nShortcuts = 1;
00228             m_keyShortcut[0] = first;
00229             m_nId = id;
00230       }
00231 
00232       wxCmd(int id = wxID_INVALID, 
00233             const wxString &name = wxEmptyString,
00234             const wxString &desc = wxEmptyString) {
00235             m_strName = name;
00236             m_strDescription = desc;
00237             m_nId = id;
00238             m_nShortcuts = 0;
00239       }
00240 
00241       virtual void DeepCopy(const wxCmd *cmd) {
00242             m_strName = cmd->m_strName;
00243             m_strDescription = cmd->m_strDescription;
00244             m_nId = cmd->m_nId;
00245             m_nShortcuts = cmd->m_nShortcuts;
00246 
00247             for (int i=0; i < m_nShortcuts; i++)
00248                   m_keyShortcut[i].DeepCopy(&cmd->m_keyShortcut[i]);
00249       }
00250 
00251       virtual wxCmd *Clone() const = 0;
00252 
00253       // Destructor
00254       virtual ~wxCmd() {}
00255 
00256 
00257 public:
00258 
00259       // Add/Remove functions
00260       // ----------------------------
00261 
00263       void AddShortcut(const wxKeyBind &key) {
00264             if (m_nShortcuts >= wxCMD_MAX_SHORTCUTS) return;
00265             m_keyShortcut[m_nShortcuts++] = key;
00266             Update();
00267       }
00268 
00270       void AddShortcut(int flags, int keycode) {
00271             if (m_nShortcuts >= wxCMD_MAX_SHORTCUTS) return;
00272             wxKeyBind key(flags, keycode);
00273             AddShortcut(key);
00274             // update is called by the previous call
00275       }
00276 
00279       void AddShortcut(const wxString &key) {
00280             if (m_nShortcuts >= wxCMD_MAX_SHORTCUTS) return;
00281             if (key.IsEmpty()) return;
00282             m_keyShortcut[m_nShortcuts++] = wxKeyBind(key);
00283             Update();
00284       }
00285 
00287       void RemoveShortcut(int n) {
00288             for (int i=n; i < m_nShortcuts; i++)      // shift array left
00289                   m_keyShortcut[i] = m_keyShortcut[i+1];
00290             m_nShortcuts--;
00291             Update();
00292       }
00293       
00295       void RemoveAllShortcuts() {
00296           m_nShortcuts=0;
00297           Update();
00298       }
00299 
00300 
00301 
00302       // Miscellaneous
00303       // ---------------------
00304 
00307       bool MatchKey(const wxKeyEvent &ev) const {
00308             for (int i=0; i < m_nShortcuts; i++)
00309                   if (m_keyShortcut[i].MatchKey(ev))
00310                         return TRUE;
00311             return FALSE;
00312       }
00313 
00320       bool IsBindTo(const wxKeyBind &key, int *n = NULL) const {
00321             for (int i=0; i < m_nShortcuts; i++) {
00322                   if (m_keyShortcut[i].Match(key)) {
00323                         if (n) *n = i;
00324                         return TRUE;
00325                   }
00326             }
00327             return FALSE;
00328       }
00329 
00332       bool Save(wxConfigBase *p, const wxString &key = wxEmptyString) const;
00333 
00337       bool Load(wxConfigBase *p, const wxString &key = wxEmptyString);
00338 
00339 
00340 
00341 
00342       // Getters
00343       // ---------------------
00344 
00345       wxKeyBind *GetShortcut(int n)                    { return &m_keyShortcut[n]; }
00346       const wxKeyBind *GetShortcut(int n) const  { return &m_keyShortcut[n]; }
00347 
00348       wxAcceleratorEntry GetAccelerator(int n) const {
00349             return wxAcceleratorEntry(GetShortcut(n)->GetModifiers(),
00350                   GetShortcut(n)->GetKeyCode(), m_nId);
00351       }
00352 
00353       int GetId() const {
00354             return m_nId;
00355       }
00356 
00357       int GetShortcutCount() const {
00358             return m_nShortcuts;
00359       }
00360 
00361       wxString GetDescription() const {
00362             return m_strDescription;
00363       }
00364 
00365       wxString GetName() const {
00366             return m_strName;
00367       }
00368 
00369       wxArrayString GetShortcutsList() const {
00370             wxArrayString arr;
00371             for (int i=0; i < m_nShortcuts; i++)
00372                   arr.Add(m_keyShortcut[i].GetStr());
00373             return arr;
00374       }
00375 
00377       virtual int GetType() const = 0;
00378 
00379 
00380 protected:
00381 
00384       virtual void Update() {}
00385 
00391       virtual void Exec(wxObject *obj, wxEvtHandler *client) = 0;
00392 };

00401 class wxCmdArray
00402 {
00403       wxArrayPtrVoid m_arr;
00404 
00405 public:
00406       wxCmdArray() {}
00407       virtual ~wxCmdArray() { Clear(); }
00408 
00409       void DeepCopy(const wxCmdArray &arr) {
00410             Clear();
00411             for (int i=0; i < arr.GetCount(); i++)
00412                   Add(arr.Item(i)->Clone());
00413       }
00414 
00415       void Add(wxCmd *p)                  { m_arr.Add(p); }
00416       void Remove(int n);
00417       void Clear();
00418 
00419       int GetCount() const          { return m_arr.GetCount(); }
00420       wxCmd *Item(int n) const      { return (wxCmd *)m_arr.Item(n); }
00421 };

00479 
00480 // Define the wxADD_KEYBINDER_SUPPORT: you should use it inside a protected
00481 // block of the windows which want to use the wxKeyBinder facilities
00482 #ifdef __WXMSW__
00483 
00484       // This is a virtual function used in wxMSW which can be used to allow
00485       // or disable the message preprocessing and thus the preprocessing of
00486       // keyshortcuts; to add keybinder support, the preprocessing must be
00487       // disabled: wxKeyBinder will care of checking the keypresses for
00488       // eventual hotkeys...
00489       #define wxADD_KEYBINDER_SUPPORT()                                                         \
00490             virtual bool MSWShouldPreProcessMessage(WXMSG*) { return FALSE; }
00491 #else
00492 
00493       // the other ports doesn't use MSWShouldPreProcessMessage...
00494       #define wxADD_KEYBINDER_SUPPORT()               /* expand to nothing */
00495 
00496 #endif

00552 class wxKeyBinder : public wxObject
00553 {
00554 protected:
00555 
00557       wxCmdArray m_arrCmd;
00558 
00566       //wxArrayPtrVoid m_arrAttachedWnd;
00567       //wxWindowList m_lstAttachedWnd;          // I don't like wxList...
00568 
00570       wxArrayPtrVoid m_arrHandlers;
00571 
00572 protected:
00573 
00574 
00576       int FindCmd(int id) const {
00577             for (int i=0; i < (int)m_arrCmd.GetCount(); i++)
00578                   if (id == m_arrCmd.Item(i)->GetId())
00579                         return i;
00580             return -1;
00581       }
00582 
00585       int FindCmdBindTo(const wxKeyBind &key, int *n = NULL) const {
00586             for (int i=0; i < (int)m_arrCmd.GetCount(); i++)
00587                   if (m_arrCmd.Item(i)->IsBindTo(key, n))
00588                         return i;
00589             return -1;
00590       }
00591 
00594       int FindMatchingCmd(const wxKeyEvent &key) const {
00595             for (int i=0; i < (int)m_arrCmd.GetCount(); i++)
00596                   if (m_arrCmd.Item(i)->MatchKey(key))
00597                         return i;
00598             return -1;
00599       }
00600 
00601 
00602 public:
00603 
00604       wxKeyBinder() {}
00605       virtual ~wxKeyBinder() { DetachAll(); }
00606 
00607 
00608 
00609 public:           // miscellaneous
00610 
00612       void OnChar(wxKeyEvent &event, wxEvtHandler *next);   
00613 
00615       void DeepCopy(const wxKeyBinder *p) {
00616             m_arrCmd.DeepCopy(p->m_arrCmd);
00617             
00618             // NEVER COPY THE ARRAY OF THE ATTACHED WINDOWs:
00619             // WE ARE NOT ATTACHED TO THE WINDOWS OF THE GIVEN BINDER !!
00620             // m_arrAttachedWnd = p->m_arrAttachedWnd;
00621       }
00622 
00624       void Reset() {
00625             m_arrCmd.Clear();
00626       }
00627 
00629       void UpdateCmd() {
00630             for (int i=0; i < (int)m_arrCmd.GetCount(); i++)
00631                   m_arrCmd.Item(i)->Update();
00632       }
00633 
00636       void Enable(bool bEnable = TRUE) {
00637             for (int i=0; i < (int)m_arrHandlers.GetCount(); i++)
00638                   ((wxBinderEvtHandler*)m_arrHandlers.Item(i))->SetEvtHandlerEnabled(bEnable);
00639       }
00640 
00642       void Attach(wxWindow *p);
00643 
00646       void AttachRecursively(wxWindow *p);
00647 
00649       void Detach(wxWindow *p);
00650 
00652       void DetachAll();
00653 
00655       bool IsAttachedTo(wxWindow *p) const
00656             { return FindHandlerIdxFor(p) != wxNOT_FOUND; }
00657 
00659       int FindHandlerIdxFor(wxWindow *p) const;
00660 
00662       wxBinderEvtHandler *FindHandlerFor(wxWindow *p) const;
00663 
00666       void ImportMenuBarCmd(wxMenuBar *p);
00667 
00670       bool Save(wxConfigBase *p, const wxString &key = wxEmptyString) const;
00671 
00673       bool Load(wxConfigBase *p, const wxString &key = wxEmptyString);
00674 
00675 
00676 
00677       // Add functions
00678       // -------------------
00679 
00680       void AddCmd(wxCmd *p) {
00681             m_arrCmd.Add(p);
00682       }
00683 
00684       void AddShortcut(int id, const wxString &key) {
00685             wxCmd *p = GetCmd(id);
00686             if (p) p->AddShortcut(key);
00687       }
00688 
00689       void AddShortcut(int id, const wxKeyBind &key) {
00690             wxCmd *p = GetCmd(id);
00691             if (p) p->AddShortcut(key);
00692       }
00693 
00694 
00695 
00696       // Getters
00697       // -------------------
00698 
00699       int GetCmdCount() const {
00700             return m_arrCmd.GetCount();
00701       }
00702 
00703       int GetAttachedWndCount() const {
00704             return m_arrHandlers.GetCount();
00705       }     
00706 
00707       wxWindow *GetWindow(int n) const {
00708             return ((wxBinderEvtHandler*)m_arrHandlers.Item(n))->GetTargetWnd();
00709       }
00710 
00711       wxCmd *GetMatchingCmd(const wxKeyEvent &key) const {
00712             int i = FindMatchingCmd(key);
00713             if (i != -1)
00714                   return m_arrCmd.Item(i);
00715             return NULL;
00716       }
00717 
00718       wxCmd *GetCmd(int id) const {
00719             int i = FindCmd(id);
00720             if (i != -1)
00721                   return m_arrCmd.Item(i);
00722             return NULL;
00723       }
00724 
00725       wxCmd *GetCmdBindTo(const wxString &key, int *n = NULL) const {
00726             int i = FindCmdBindTo(wxKeyBind(key), n);
00727             if (i != -1)
00728                   return m_arrCmd.Item(i);
00729             return NULL;
00730       }
00731 
00732       wxKeyBind *GetShortcut(int id, int n) const {
00733             wxCmd *p = GetCmd(id);
00734             if (p) return p->GetShortcut(n);
00735             return NULL;
00736       }
00737 
00738       wxString GetShortcutStr(int id, int n) const {
00739             wxKeyBind *p = GetShortcut(id, n);
00740             if (p) return p->GetStr();
00741             return wxEmptyString;
00742       }
00743 
00744       wxArrayString GetShortcutsList(int id) const {
00745             wxCmd *p = GetCmd(id);
00746             if (p) return p->GetShortcutsList();
00747             return wxArrayString();
00748       }
00749 
00750       wxArrayPtrVoid *GetHandlersArr()          { return &m_arrHandlers; }    
00751 
00752       wxCmdArray *GetArray()                          { return &m_arrCmd;     }
00753       const wxCmdArray *GetArray() const        { return &m_arrCmd; }
00754 
00755 
00756 private:
00757       DECLARE_CLASS(wxKeyBinder)    
00758 };

00766 class wxKeyProfile : public wxKeyBinder

00774       wxString m_strDescription;

00776 public:
00777       wxKeyProfile(const wxString &name = wxEmptyString, 
00778                         const wxString &desc = wxEmptyString) 
00779             : m_strName(name), m_strDescription(desc) {}
00780             
00781       wxKeyProfile(const wxKeyProfile &tocopy)
00782             { DeepCopy(&tocopy); }
00783       
00784       virtual ~wxKeyProfile() {}
00785 
00786       void DeepCopy(const wxKeyProfile *p) {
00787             wxKeyBinder::DeepCopy(p);
00788             m_strName = p->m_strName;
00789             m_strDescription = p->m_strDescription;
00790       }
00791 
00792 public:           // miscellaneous
00793       
00794       void SetName(const wxString &name) { m_strName=name; }
00795       void SetDesc(const wxString &str)  { m_strDescription=str; }
00796

00798       wxString GetDesc() const            { return m_strDescription; }
00799

00801       bool Load(wxConfigBase *p, const wxString &key = wxEmptyString);
00802

00806 };

00814 class wxKeyProfileArray
00815 {
00819       wxArrayPtrVoid m_arr;
00820 
00821 public:
00822       wxKeyProfileArray() {}
00823       virtual ~wxKeyProfileArray() {}
00824       
00825       
00830       
00831       int GetCount() const                { return m_arr.GetCount(); }
00832       void Add(wxKeyProfile *p)           { m_arr.Add(p); }
00833       wxKeyProfile *Item(int n)           { return (wxKeyProfile*)m_arr.Item(n); }
00834       void Clear()                              { m_arr.Clear(); }
00835       void Remove(wxKeyProfile *p)  { m_arr.Remove(p); }
00836       bool IsEmpty() const                { return m_arr.IsEmpty(); }
00837 
00838       const wxKeyProfile *Item(int n) const                 { return (wxKeyProfile*)m_arr.Item(n); }
00839       void RemoveAt(size_t i, size_t count = 1)       { m_arr.RemoveAt(i, count); }
00840       void Insert(wxKeyProfile *p, int n)                   { m_arr.Insert(p, n); }
00841       
00843       
00844       
00848       void Cleanup() {
00849             for (int i=0; i < GetCount(); i++)
00850                   delete Item(i);
00851             Clear();
00852       }
00853 
00858       void AttachAllTo(wxWindow *w) {
00859             for (int i=0; i<GetCount(); i++)
00860                   Item(i)->Attach(w);
00861       }
00862 
00864       void EnableAll(bool bEnable = TRUE) {
00865             for (int i=0; i<GetCount(); i++)
00866                   Item(i)->Enable(bEnable);
00867       }
00868 
00870       void DetachAllFrom(wxWindow *w) {
00871             for (int i=0; i<GetCount(); i++)
00872                   Item(i)->Detach(w);
00873       }
00874 
00876       void DetachAll() {
00877             for (int i=0; i<GetCount(); i++)
00878                   Item(i)->DetachAll();
00879       }
00880 
00882       bool Save(wxConfigBase *p, const wxString &key = wxEmptyString) const;
00883       
00884       // Loads from the given wxConfig object an array of wxKeyProfiles.
00885       bool Load(wxConfigBase *p, const wxString &key = wxEmptyString);
00886 };

00902 class wxKeyMonitorTextCtrl : public wxTextCtrl
00903 {
00904 public:
00905       wxKeyMonitorTextCtrl(
00906             wxWindow* parent,
00907             wxWindowID id,
00908             const wxString& value = "",
00909             const wxPoint& pos = wxDefaultPosition,
00910             const wxSize& size = wxDefaultSize,
00911             long style = wxTE_PROCESS_ENTER,
00912             const wxValidator& validator = wxDefaultValidator,
00913             const wxString& name = wxTextCtrlNameStr) :
00914             wxTextCtrl(parent, id, value, pos, size, style, validator, name) {}
00915 
00916       virtual ~wxKeyMonitorTextCtrl() {}
00917 
00918 public:
00919 
00922       void OnKey(wxKeyEvent &);
00923 
00925       bool IsValidKeyComb() const {
00926             return !GetValue().IsEmpty() && GetValue().Last() != '+';
00927       }

00932 };

01034 class wxKeyConfigPanel : public wxPanel
01035 {
01036 public:
01037 
01039       wxKeyConfigPanel(wxWindow* parent,
01040             wxKeyProfile *pBinder,              // the key binder to edit (can be NULL)
01041             int buildMode = wxKEYBINDER_DEFAULT_BUILDMODE,
01042             wxWindowID id = -1, 
01043             const wxPoint& pos = wxDefaultPosition,
01044             const wxSize& size = wxDefaultSize, 
01045             long style = wxTAB_TRAVERSAL,
01046             const wxString& name = "wxKeyConfigPanel");
01047 
01048       virtual ~wxKeyConfigPanel() {}
01049 
01050 
01051 public:           // import commands
01052 
01059       virtual void ImportMenuBarCmd(wxMenuBar *, 
01060                                                 const wxString &rootname = "Menu bar");
01061 
01068       virtual void ImportKeyProfileCmd(int n, const wxString &rootname = "Commands");
01069 
01070 
01071 public:           // keyprofile utilities
01072 
01080       virtual void AddProfile(wxKeyProfile *p, bool bImport = FALSE, 
01081                                           const wxString &rootname = "Commands");
01082                                           
01084       virtual void AddProfiles(wxKeyProfileArray &arr);
01085 
01088       wxKeyProfile *GetProfile(int n) const
01089             { wxASSERT(m_pKeyProfiles); return (wxKeyProfile *)m_pKeyProfiles->GetClientData(n); }
01090 
01092       wxKeyProfile *GetSelProfile() const
01093             { int n=GetSelProfileIdx(); return (n >= 0 ? GetProfile(n) : NULL); }
01094 
01102       int GetSelProfileIdx() const
01103             { wxASSERT(m_pKeyProfiles); return m_nCurrentProf; }
01104             
01107       wxKeyProfileArray GetProfiles() const;
01108 
01109 
01110 public:           // miscellaneous
01111 
01115       virtual void ApplyChanges();
01116 
01120       void EnableKeyProfiles(bool bEnable = TRUE);
01121 
01124       void DisableKeyProfiles()
01125             { EnableKeyProfiles(FALSE); }
01126 
01127

01129 
01131       void OnIdle(wxIdleEvent &event);
01132 
01133       void OnTreeCommandSelected(wxTreeEvent &event);
01134       void OnListCommandSelected(wxCommandEvent &event);
01135       
01136       void OnBindingSelected(wxCommandEvent &event);
01137       void OnProfileSelected(wxCommandEvent &event);
01138       void OnCategorySelected(wxCommandEvent &event);
01139

01143       void OnRemoveKey(wxCommandEvent &event);
01144       void OnRemoveAllKey(wxCommandEvent &event);

01175

01179             { return (m_nBuildMode & wxKEYBINDER_USE_TREECTRL) != 0; }
